PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FurnitureTypeFileCabinet
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A set of specific properties for furniture type file cabinet HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_FileCabinet

PropertyDef.Name: WithLock
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the file cabinet is lockable (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
